column5: Spiel we need you to lead the troops Here is to a speedy recovery
Thumbs up Chris.
Get well soon. Would be nice to see you at Lakair!
I'm glad to hear that your trials are almost over, Chris.  Best wishes to you for a full and speedy recovery.  I think Brook needs to play some fetch.
Although I have never met the man judging by how he is loved by other OFC`ers he must be a great guy.  I hope you have complete and speedy recovery Chris
Don't anyone run over to the hospital.. he's on his way home!!
Hey Chris, recover slowly.  Listen to the docs.  Rehab, rehab, rehab...............  Shoot me the latest porn of your new incision, but don't make the rest of the members look at it.
Why is he always better looking in pictures than in person?? Were all here for support, and Im sure he knows that.
Best wishes for a full and speedy recovery
He spoke to a mutual friend this morning and seemed in very good spirits.  He should be home soon.
Thats cause Im ice fishing, and he,s pissed he,s not.LOL  Easy does it fella.Get better soon.
Thanks Wayne, I was getting ready to head over. Just spoke with Spiel on the phone and all is well   His only complaint is a sore throat  G
Too late to post this and say "get well and hurry home...Brook misses you"...but she will make your recovery that much quicker...  Cheers Mate
Best of luck to ya Chris, you've been thru alot and hopefully this'll fix everything up like new.
Chris is home and feeling worn out.He put himself to bed and I am sure we will see him around some tomorrow.   Art
Thanks Kickingfrog, you just made my day. Chris don't worry, I won't say a thing Lay down bud, let those stitches heal, then you can hit me. Your my IDOL, I just new you had it in you
I guess prayers do work sometimes!
Thanks all.  Hopefully this will be the last time they poke around in my neck.
HEY you're up early and on the computer, things are back to normal!
Good to see you back on the puter again...next step is to get you back on the water. Joe
Hiya Chris! Glad to see you here.
I guess they found the head empty so now they are working their way down.  Glad your up and about kind of.   Art
Yay, you're feeling well enough to be up and posting  Glad all went well hon, I'll call ya later.  Joey
Yay... Glad to see your doing well Speil...

GLad you're up and about Chris... and hoping you're felling much better than when you went in! I am also hoping that Gerritt can talk you into Bernies later next month! If yah play your cards right, there may be a some what "frilly" shirt in it for yah! LMAO Heal fast my friend! HH
Good to see you are home Chris. hope all went well with the surgery, and it will be the last. im sure brook was all over you like a hobo on a ham sandwich when you walked thru the door..LOL
Sure is good to see you back online again Chris.   Hoping this will take care of things once and for all.   See ya in June bud.

Spiel/Chris..  I hope all went well today, and that you are back and mobile and pain free, in the very near future... You and I have been friends for what 10+ years now? Here is an image I think will help bring a smile to you're face...      You are in  my thoughts bud.    G.   PS... thank you for talking me out of my decision.
I hinted about it in another thread G... but Spiel always being the private type I didn't mention a name.  He'll be out ice fishing in no time!!!
Hope I can get him to Bernies
Get well soon Spiel. We miss ya
Absolutely Gerritt. Get well soon Spiel. I need more photos like this one.
get well soon Spiel...theres a few people that are missing your Mod Que Methods..  speedy recovery!
All the best bud.
Funny I never thought of him as the photogenic type.      Be well.

Just an heads up, I spoke with his nurse via phone, and Spiel is doing well, he is sleeping, but other then that everything went very well. for those interested he is at Hamilton General Hospital, 6 West, Room 5 Bed #2  G.
Chin up Spiel. Hope all is well and that you get well soon.  Can't wait to see you back.  Nemo
P.S. Good on you Gerritt for giving us the update. You're a good mate.
I also have been thinking of Chris today. Hopefully he will be up and running by the opener in May.
Get well chris
Been thinking about you all day hon, hope you are back on your feet in no time and feeling better!  Joey

ok... so i JUST read this and had no clue that Spiel was off sick.  I sent him a reminder notice about the monthly mag he puts on here for us  Oh well, I am sure he will chuckle anyways..  Take care Spiel.... I can wait a little longer.. lol
I'd be thinkin you sent a message to the wrong guy about a monthly "mag" Splash !
Yep... u are right... I sent it to Quesnal  So now i am just a tired confused working guy.... going to bed... going ice fishing ( local ) tomorrow.

Heading out the door to fish some Jumbo's with Big Cliff. If your ears are ringing Chris...they should be...cause we will be talking about you. And wishing  a full and SPEEDY recovery for you.  Take it easy and be well.
Best wishes for a speedy recovery Speil..
Get well quick, Chris. Oh and pick up a box of beer on the way home. You're out of beer.

He's become a good friend and I know he's a fighter. He'll pull through.  Looking forward to more of this in the future.        I managed to drag him out earlier this fall. The pain he endured was brutal...our "day" was done after a couple of hours.  The man has a knack for catching fish though.   He's going to be a holy terror when he's pain free.
God speed on your recover Chris. You'll be catching more sheephead then you can handle before you know it.
Best wishes for a full and speedy recovery Chris.   Tracker (Don)
Sure do hope this round will take care of things once and for all for ya Chris.   All our best from Rich & Patsy

Way to go Chris it's the start to the end of your pain bud. I am so glad they were able to get you in quicker than expected.Here is to a  speedy recovery and just call and Joe and I will make it happen.   Art
